sys_script.name: Display bidder as anonymous

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e6fafb0c9366c61094e3f15a7bba105a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_bid</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Display bidder as  anonymous</name><order>300</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Check if the user viewing the record is not an admin
    if (!gs.hasRole('admin')) {
        current.opened_by.setDisplayValue('Anonymous');
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 05:22:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e6fafb0c9366c61094e3f15a7bba105a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display bidder as  anonymous</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e6fafb0c9366c61094e3f15a7bba105a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:58:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e6fafb0c9366c61094e3f15a7bba105a"/></record_update>
